_sText:
Maps created by Farmer69.

V2 fixes; 
Fixed all the pistol and sub-machinegun farming maps.
Fixed the planting/defusing map.
Fixed the snipe_hunter map.
Added a tutorial on how everything works "farm_a1Tutorial.bsp"

Please run the tutorial first, then go ahead and farm some achievements.

Simply move all the maps into your
C:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\ACCOUNT-NAME\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\maps

All the maps are automatic, just start a local server with the map you want, and join T.

In the bomb/defuse map, you might need 1 friend for certain achievements.

For the hostage rescue achievement farming map, join CT, ofc. The map can farm for you around 8 hostages/10sec
Calculations; 500 hostages in 10 minutes.

Always use the map "farm_purifier" to remove any annoying commands that get stuck to your console after farming.

Now, grab some snack and enjoy the show. I'd advice you not to AFK for more than 15 minutes;
The map might glitch and/or your stats get to exaggerated.

!!!These maps do NOT work on dedicated servers, only local servers hosted by the person farming!!!
